item.title: By: JAYAKUMAR
item.dc:creator: JAYAKUMAR
item.description: VS is the tongue of common man.I wonder why some people are deadly opposing him though they are not having any support of public.He seems to be isolated even by cutting off this beloved personal assistants who were with him for years.But V S is the right..... Brave Lion .......Lal salam saghave.
item.content:encoded: VS is the tongue of common man.I wonder why some people are deadly opposing him though they are not having any support of public.He seems to be isolated even by cutting off this beloved personal assistants who were with him for years.But V S is the right….. Brave Lion …….Lal salam saghave.
